data.description: Momentum indicators of share price movement
data.similar:
PostScript::Graph::Stock, Finance::Shares::MySQL,
    Finance::Shares::Log, Finance::Shares::Trends,
    Finance::Shares::Averages, Finance::Shares::Oscillators,
    Finance::Shares::Model
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I plan a series of modules under Finance::Shares if that's OK.

    They will build into a toolkit for developing and evaluating
    investment strategies using technical (chart) analysis techniques.

    This module provides objects for various momentum-based indicators
    such as MACD.
